text: @ABC @Rtreatwilliams My heart! 💔❤ That beautiful child! I'm crying with her. So much love. Oh my...I wonder about the children at the border. I haven't heard any statistics about all the children being kept from their parents. Is Trump counting Covid-19 cases among that population? We need answers.
